behaviour.feedbackOnCorrect: Correct! The speed and scale of technological development means that regulation is inevitably a step or two behind and we are thus reliant on ethical behaviour on the part of engineers and developers.
behaviour.feedbackOnWrong: Incorrect!The speed and scale of technological development means that regulation is inevitably a step or two behind and we are thus reliant on ethical behaviour on the part of engineers and developers

l10n.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

question: Regulation is always up to date with technological development to ensure that large technology companies act in our collective best interest.
